content: another free woolly wormhead pattern that can be worked in any yarn for any size **yarn** 115g/190yd/174m aran weight single ply or plied yarn **needles & notions** set 4mm/uk8/us6 & 5mm/uk6/us8 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in countess ablaze grande merino aran 190yd/174m per 115g 100% merino shown in size 21in/53 25cm on model with 22in/56cm circumference head **gauge** 20sts x 28rows to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over stocking stitch 20sts x 30rows to 4in/10cm on 4mm needles over twisted rib **sizes** to fit size 15 17 19 21 23 25 in/ 38 43 25 48 25 53 25 58 5 63 5 cm finished size 12 75 14 5 16 17 75 19 25 20 75 in/ 32 5 36 75 40 75 45 49 52 75 cm **skills required** knit & purl sts twisted stitches knitting into the row below **accessibility statement** the pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background **support** do you need help with this pattern we have a specific discussion thread in the wormhead s hats group 5 where you can ask any questions 1 https //www woollywormhead com/the-woolly-hat-society 2 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 3 https //www woollywormhead com/the-woolly-hat-society 4 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 5 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/4208380
